channel.title: FLF - The Ezra Institute Podcast for Cultural Reformation
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: The Sixth Commandment: Thou Shall Not Murder [The Ezra Institute Podcast for Cultural Reformation]
item.description:
We begin this episode by examining the biblical definition of murder, and looking at cases where the taking of life is prohibited, where it is permitted, and the single situation where it is required by God. We also consider how our society’s rejection of God is evident in legalized murder in the form of abortion and euthanasia, as well as Jesus’ teaching about murderous talk and attitudes that break this commandment.

The March Book of the Month is The Mission of God! Get it on sale here.

Register for the Runner Academy, Christianity & Culture Colloquium, or Worldview Leadership Academy.
item.author: Joe Boot, Ryan Eras
item.itunes:author: Joe Boot, Ryan Eras

item.title: State of the Nation, 2023 [The Ezra Institute Podcast for Cultural Reformation]
item.description:
We take a short recess from the Ten Commandments series to talk about drag queen story hour protests, global Anglicanism, and other important news from around the world. And is the Ezra Institute going to be on the CBC?

Register for 2023 training programs: Runner Academy; Worldview Leadership Academy; and the Christianity and Culture Colloquium.

Get The Mission of God as the March Book of the Month on sale now
